title: Ordinals Protocol: NFTs incorporated into Bitcoin chain
extract: The arrival of the Ordinals Protocol has generated a lot of repercussions, allowing the incursion of NFTs on the Bitcoin blockchain.
author: Luciano Garriga

title: Understanding Ethereum Blockchain Basics
extract: Ethereum is a decentralized blockchain platform that establishes a peer-to-peer network that executes and verifies application code: smart contracts.
author: Luciano Garriga

title: MINTangible introduces in IP blockchain field
extract: The company has announced a solution that allows creators and brands the ability to link Intellectual Property licenses to NFTs.
author: Luciano Garriga
